name: Charlie Bartlett
description: A rich kid becomes the self-appointed psychiatrist to the student body of his new high school.

review.author: anitalansing-40-581915
review.heading: EXTREMELY ENTERTAINING
review.reviewBody: This is one of the most near-perfect movies that I have watched in a very long time. I was completely enthralled with the storyline, the actors, and the movie itself. The movie had it all, comedy, drama, and guidance on the angsts of growing up and being a teen. I could not have asked for a more complete movie. Very good, very, very good.
